meta.name: description
meta.content: Upper Mississippi Academy is a public charter school located in St. Paul, Minnesota. We provide a high quality education for students grades 6-12 by using innovative teaching methods to foster creativity and promote student achievement.

div.p: Access UMA’s weekly newsletters here. If you’d like to receive the newsletter by email, please sign up at the bottom of this page.

WELCOME! Upper Mississippi Academy is a public charter school serving grades 6-12. We are a collaborative community engaging lifelong learners in active, authentic experiences through our 4 EXPERIENTIAL LEARNING PATHWAYS.

We would appreciate UMA families taking a few minutes to complete the Intent to Return form by March 1, 2020 so we have an indication of how many students will be returning at each grade level next year.

div.p:
April 21, 2020 @ 4:45 pm - 6:45 pm
Upper Mississippi Academy - Online

Board meetings are open to the public and take place the 3rd Tuesday of every month from 4:45 p.m. - 6:45 p.m. The April meeting will be held online via Google Hangouts. Access the meeting with this link and phone # 1 615-813-1003‬ PIN: ‪508 931 967‬#
